column6: The Avengers haven't been able to help, the US government is somehow involved and the web of intrigue surrounding Natasha has tightened into a noose! Will the Black Widow discover who's out to destroy her before it's too late?
column7: | Black Widow | Lady Bullseye | Winter Soldier
